name: Spider Dash - Shoot And Swing
description:
Spider-Dash is a high quality graphics game. You can immerse yourself upto the endless heights of Spider-Dash.

Cast your perfect web to reach the ultimate heights. Don't be just a climber, let it Swing. Swing as high as you can in Spider-Dash. It really is fun to swing and reach your goals to get Achievements.

We are sure you will really enjoy playing Spider-Dash.

Features:-

  • Endless
  • HD graphics
  • Leaderboard
  • Achievements
  • Play games services login

Enjoy the Gaming.

For any feedback contact us at our email.
